doc.field: C G f4417reute b f BC-CARGILL-STRIKE-TALKS 03-17 0068

Further talks will be held this morning at Cargill U.K. Ltd's oilseed processing plant at Seaforth, after yesterday's meeting between management and unions failed to produce a solution to end the three month old strike, a company spokesman said. Talks will be extended to tomorrow if there is no breakthrough in today's session, he said. REUTER
